about_the_game:
The hotel sits in the middle of the hustle and bustle. Outside, the light of a car shines through. With a loud thumping sound, blood starts to cover the street. A scheme that has been hidden for years is about to be revealed...



You are a retired ace soldier who just returned home and was thrust into a car accident that hurt your closely related family.
You try to find the truth through all the lies, searching for clues.
You will explore a chamber deeply hidden in the old house and go undercover as a bodyguard of the lady of the Xu’s Group.
You are going to meet a once-famous star whose family took a fall and battle with the mysterious S whose stand is unknown...
While trying to find your way out of all the forces, you have to investigate their pasts and secrets as well.
Waiting ahead are murder cases and cloning mysteries.
Who is she?
What does she have to do with the case that was sealed for years?



While deep in a maze of mysteries and walking toward the light, are you going to let your desire expand under the shadow, or are you going to unravel the mysteries and face the challenges?
Choosing between schemes and revenge, trust and betrayal, love and justice, there’s only a thin line between darkness and light.
And the ending is up to you.



• Multiple storylines, undecided ending
The game is featured with storylines of four female protagonists. Players are free to decide where the story goes and explore what it means to be human in the case. Every decision made is crucial.



• Interactive gameplay with multiple options. This is your stage.
Featured with exciting QTE gameplay, intriguing realistic interaction, and immersive interactive VR panoramic evidence searching which is fun and challenging, this game promises that you will be put in the character’s shoes.



• Simultaneous evidence board. It’s all about the way you think.
All the details during the process of deduction were carefully made, which will help you to find evidence in the threads of the plot and find the perpetrator behind everything.

• Interpreted by the original crew of Love of Replica.
This game was inspired by Love of Replica which is a show with a sweet yet suspenseful plot. It stars the professional original crew of the show and presents an immersive entertainment experience. The storyline is brand new. This time, you will decide the fate of the characters.
